page.title: 07THE RECREATION GROUND...
page.content: The Recreation ground is situated in the centre of the village of Methwold and is owned by the Parish Council.It is a large grass playing field which includes a football pitch,swings,roundabout and a slide.The Primary School uses the Recreation ground for athletics, cricket and football, and the Football Club uses it regularly for matches and training sessions.The Football Club have a pavillion situated on the Recreation ground which provides its members with changing facilities, toilets and showers. The annual August Bank Holiday Fete is held on the Recreation ground, and it is also used during the summer holidays by the childrens Holiday Club.The young people of the village use it as a meeting place and mothers take their children there to play.
